com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.containers:Rest.description: Represents the container's restart policy type - always means that each time te container exists, it will be restarted.

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.containers:Prop.description: Represents the propagation mode for populating the mounted filesystem artifacts from the host to the container

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.containers:Port.description: Represents a network port mappings for ports from the container exposed on the host's network interface

properties.name: proto
properties.description: Port protocol

properties.name: hostPort
properties.description: Port of the host machine

properties.name: hostPortEnd
properties.description: Host port allocation range

properties.name: containerPort
properties.description: Port inside the container

properties.name: hostIP
properties.description: IP Address of the port to be mapped

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.containers:LogD.description: Represents the different supported types of logging that can be made for a container instance

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.containers:Stat.description: Represents the current container's status given the container's lifecycle

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.containers:Devi.description: Represents a serial device exposed from the host to the container mapped to a certain internal container's path

properties.name: pathOnHost
properties.description: Device path on the host machine

properties.name: pathInContainer
properties.description: Device path inside the container

properties.name: cgroupPermissions
properties.description: cgroup permissions

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.containers:Cont.description: Provides lifecycle management functionalities per container and enhances container state changes traceability

statusProperties.name: imageRef
statusProperties.description: The container's image full reference in the format <host/ip[:port]>/<image-name>:<tag>

statusProperties.name: config
statusProperties.description: Provides the read-only container's configuration provided when the container was created

operations.name: stopWithOptions
operations.description: Stops the container instance applying the provided options

operations.name: remove
operations.description: Removes the container instance and feature (if the removal is successful) and forces the removal if the container is runing

operations.name: update
operations.description: Updates the container instance with the provided options.

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.containers:LogM.description: Represents the log messages handling mode (buffered or direct) from the container to the log driver

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.containers:Moun.description: Represents filesystem artifacts mounted from the host to the container

properties.name: source
properties.description: Path to the source mount point

properties.name: destination
properties.description: Path to the container mount point

properties.name: propagationMode
properties.description: Propagation mode of the mount point

properties.name: memory
properties.description: Hard memory limit. The maximum amount of memory the container can use in the form of an integer followed by a modifier representing the unit of measure (k, M or G). The minimum allowed value is 3M.

properties.name: memoryReservation
properties.description: Soft memory limit for the container in the form of an integer followed by a modifier representing the unit of measure (k, M or G). If set, must be smaller than memory.

properties.name: memorySwap
properties.description: Total amount of memory + swap that the container can use in the form of an integer followed by a modifier representing the unit of measure (k, M or G). If set must not be smaller than memory. If equal to memory, than the container will not have access to swap. If not set and memory is set, than the container can use as much swap as the memory setting. If set to -1, the container can use unlimited swap, up to the amount available on the host.

properties.name: restartPolicy
properties.description: Updates the restart policy for the container. The policy will be applied when the container exits.

properties.name: forced
properties.description: Whether to send a SIG_KILL signal to the container's process if it does not finish within the timeout specified. The default is true

properties.name: timeout
properties.description: A timeout period in seconds in which the container must stop

properties.name: signal
properties.description: A specific signal to send to the container in order to stop it. Signals could be specified by using their names or numbers, e.g. SIGINT or 2. The default is SIGTERM

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.containers:Stat.description: Represents the current container's full state given the container's lifecycle

properties.name: status
properties.description: Represents the status of this container - Creating, Created, Running, Stopped, Paused, Exited, Dead, Unknown

properties.name: pid
properties.description: Represents the container's process's PID

properties.name: error
properties.description: Indicates whether there was a problem that has occurred while changing the state of a container

properties.name: exitCode
properties.description: Represents the last exit code of the container's internal root process

properties.name: startedAt
properties.description: A timestamp of the last successfull container's start operation

properties.name: finishedAt
properties.description: A timestamp of the last container's exit

properties.name: oomKilled
properties.description: Indicated that container is killed due to out of memory

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.containers:Netw.description: Represents the container's networking capabilities type based on the desired communication mode

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.containers:LogC.description: Represents the full logging configuration for a container instance

properties.name: type
properties.description: Indicates what kind of logging will be made for this container instance. The default is JSON_FILE

properties.name: maxFiles
properties.description: The maximum number of log files permitted. If the rolled logs output creates excess files, the oldest one is removed

properties.name: maxSize
properties.description: The maximum size of the log before it is rolled. Must be in the form of an integer followed by a modifier representing the unit of measure (k, M, G or T)

properties.name: rootDir
properties.description: The root directory where to store the logs for the container under a subdirectory named by its ID

properties.name: mode
properties.description: Log messages handling mode (buffered or direct) from the container to the log driver

properties.name: maxBufferSize
properties.description: The maximum size of the log buffer it is rolled. Must be in the form of an integer followed by a modifier representing the unit of measure (k, M, G or T)

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.containers:Conf.description: Represents a fully featured container configuration supported by the Bosch IoT Edge Agent

properties.name: domainName
properties.description: The container domain

properties.name: hostName
properties.description: Host name for the container, if omitted the container name with suffix -host will be set

properties.name: mountPoints
properties.description: The container's mount points

properties.name: env
properties.description: Environmental variables that can be set for the container

properties.name: cmd
properties.description: Command with arguments that is executed when the container is started

properties.name: decryption
properties.description: Keys and recipients for image decryption

properties.name: devices
properties.description: Host devices accessible by the container

properties.name: privileged
properties.description: Indicates if the container must be run in privileged mode

properties.name: restartPolicy
properties.description: Restart policy for the container instance

properties.name: extraHosts
properties.description: Host aliases to be added to the container's networking configuration

properties.name: portMappings
properties.description: Ports exposed from the container to the host

properties.name: networkMode
properties.description: The container's networking capabilities type based on the desired communication mode

properties.name: openStdin
properties.description: Open stdin for interactive mode

properties.name: tty
properties.description: Attach standard streams to a TTY, including stdin if it is not closed

properties.name: log
properties.description: Represents the logging configuration for the container

properties.name: resources
properties.description: Represents the resource limits for the container. By default, a container has no resource constraints.

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.containers:Rest.description: Represents the container's restart policy configuratoin

properties.name: maxRetryCount
properties.description: Max number of restart attempts

properties.name: retryTimeout
properties.description: Retry timeout in seconds

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of the container's restart policy

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.containers:Decr.description: Represents the data needed for image decryption

properties.name: keys
properties.description: Private keys (GPG private key ring, JWE or PKCS7) used for decrypting the container's image, the format is: filepath_private_key[:password]

properties.name: recipients
properties.description: Recipients (only for PKCS7 and must be an x509) used for decrypting the container's image, the format is: pkcs7:filepath_x509_certificate
